verses.text: And the LORD said unto Noah, Come thou and all thy house into the ark; for thee have I seen righteous before me in this generation.

crossRefs.note: Noah righteous; walked with God
By faith Noah prepared an ark

verses.text: Of every clean beast thou shalt take to thee by sevens, the male and his female: and of beasts that are not clean by two, the male and his female.

crossRefs.note: Clean/unclean animals
Clean beasts for sacrifice

verses.text: Of fowls also of the air by sevens, the male and the female; to keep seed alive upon the face of all the earth.

crossRefs.note: Be fruitful and multiply
Animals went in two by two

verses.text: For yet seven days, and I will cause it to rain upon the earth forty days and forty nights; and every living substance that I have made will I destroy from off the face of the earth.

crossRefs.note: The end of all flesh is come
Rain forty days and forty nights

verses.text: And Noah did according unto all that the LORD commanded him.

crossRefs.note: So did he
As God had commanded Noah

verses.text: And Noah was six hundred years old when the flood of waters was upon the earth.

crossRefs.note: Noah’s age at begetting sons
Noah’s age marked after the flood

verses.text: And Noah went in, and his sons, and his wife, and his sons' wives with him, into the ark, because of the waters of the flood.

crossRefs.note: Thou, thy sons, thy wife…
Eight souls saved by water

verses.text: Of clean beasts, and of beasts that are not clean, and of fowls, and of every thing that creepeth upon the earth,

crossRefs.note: Kinds of beasts and creeping things

verses.text: There went in two and two unto Noah into the ark, the male and the female, as God had commanded Noah.

crossRefs.note: Two of every sort
Went in male and female of all flesh

verses.text: And it came to pass after seven days, that the waters of the flood were upon the earth.

crossRefs.note: Seven days warning
The flood came and took them all away

verses.text: In the six hundredth year of Noah's life, in the second month, the seventeenth day of the month, the same day were all the fountains of the great deep broken up, and the windows of heaven were opened.

crossRefs.note: Fountains of the deep and windows of heaven stopped
Springs of the sea (depths)

verses.text: And the rain was upon the earth forty days and forty nights.

crossRefs.note: Forty days and nights foretold
After forty days Noah opened the window

verses.text: In the selfsame day entered Noah, and Shem, and Ham, and Japheth, the sons of Noah, and Noah's wife, and the three wives of his sons with them, into the ark;

crossRefs.note: Covenant includes family
Of them was the whole earth overspread

verses.text: They, and every beast after his kind, and all the cattle after their kind, and every creeping thing that creepeth upon the earth after his kind, and every fowl after his kind, every bird of every sort.

crossRefs.note: After their kind repeated
Two of every sort shall come unto thee

verses.text: And they went in unto Noah into the ark, two and two of all flesh, wherein is the breath of life.

crossRefs.note: Breath of life
All in whose nostrils was the breath of life

verses.text: And they that went in, went in male and female of all flesh, as God had commanded him: and the LORD shut him in.

crossRefs.note: Male and female of every kind
He that openeth, and no man shutteth (theme)

verses.text: And the flood was forty days upon the earth; and the waters increased, and bare up the ark, and it was lift up above the earth.

crossRefs.note: God made a wind to pass over the earth
Figure of salvation through water

verses.text: And the waters prevailed, and were increased greatly upon the earth; and the ark went upon the face of the waters.

crossRefs.note: Waters prevailed 150 days
The LORD sitteth upon the flood

verses.text: And the waters prevailed exceedingly upon the earth; and all the high hills, that were under the whole heaven, were covered.

crossRefs.note: Tops of the mountains seen later
The world that then was… perished

verses.text: Fifteen cubits upward did the waters prevail; and the mountains were covered.

crossRefs.note: Ark dimensions and cubit
If he overturn the waters… they dry up

verses.text: And all flesh died that moved upon the earth, both of fowl, and of cattle, and of beast, and of every creeping thing that creepeth upon the earth, and every man:

crossRefs.note: I will destroy man… and beast
Death by sin came upon all

verses.text: All in whose nostrils was the breath of life, of all that was in the dry land, died.

crossRefs.note: Breath of life given
Breath of life in all flesh

verses.text: And every living substance was destroyed which was upon the face of the ground, both man, and cattle, and the creeping things, and the fowl of the heaven; and they were destroyed from the earth: and Noah only remained alive, and they that were with him in the ark.

crossRefs.note: God remembered Noah
House saved by the ark

verses.text: And the waters prevailed upon the earth an hundred and fifty days.

crossRefs.note: End of the hundred and fifty days the waters were abated
Waters stood above the mountains; at thy rebuke they fled
